page.title: 17RETIRING IN NORTH HOLMWOOD
page.content: OLDER PEOPLE _ THEIR THOUGHTS : We spoke to a number of older, retired people who live in the village.Many of them live in special bungalows and flats provided by the council. They preffered the area before all the new estates were built.They don't like the noise and behaviour of some of the children when they play near their houses. They hope the children get a proper play area supplied by the council.(The children have presented a petition to their local councillors). All pensioners say they rely on the small local post office situated in a small shop called "The Cabin"to collect their pensions-they hope it is never closed.They say there is to much crime in the area,and they feel longer sentances should be given.
